patthana16.20:1.1_0: Kusalaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nacittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.20:1.1_1: Kusalaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naabyākato nacittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.20:1.1_2: Kusalaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nacittasamuṭṭhāno ca naabyākato nacittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana16.20:2.1_0: Akusalaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nacittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.20:2.1_1: Akusalaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naabyākato nacittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.20:2.1_2: Akusalaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nacittasamuṭṭhāno ca naabyākato nacittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana16.20:3.1_0: Abyākataṁ cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nacittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana16.20:4.1_0: Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.
patthana16.20:5.1_0: Kusalaṁ nocittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nanocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pañca.
patthana16.20:6.1_0: Akusalaṁ nocittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nanocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pañca.
patthana16.20:7.1_0: Abyākataṁ nocittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nanocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana16.20:8.1_0: Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate terasa.
